statements: SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_profiles;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE age < 25 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE first_name = 'John' AND last_name = 'Doe';
SELECT user_id, preferences->>'theme' AS theme FROM user_profiles WHERE preferences->>'language' = 'English';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE preferences->>'language' = 'English' AND preferences->>'theme' = 'Dark';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_profiles ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, registration_date FROM user_profiles WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, profile_image_url FROM user_profiles WHERE profile_image_url IS NOT NULL;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT username, language FROM user_profiles AS up JOIN preferences AS p ON up.user_id = p.user_id WHERE p.theme = 'dark';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT user_id, profile_image_url, registration_date FROM user_profiles ORDER BY registration_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM user_profiles WHERE email = 'example@email.com';
SELECT user_id, email FROM user_profiles WHERE first_name = 'John' AND last_name = 'Doe';
SELECT user_id, theme, language FROM user_preferences ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT experience_id, experience_name, duration_minutes FROM ar_vr_experiences WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles
SELECT user_id, first_name, email FROM user_profiles ORDER BY user_id DESC
SELECT theme, language FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 3
SELECT user_id, experience_name, duration_minutes FROM ar_vr_experiences WHERE duration_minutes > 30
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM user_profiles INNER JOIN user_preferences ON user_profiles.user_id = user_preferences.user_id
SELECT * FROM UserProfiles;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM UserProfiles ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email, profile_pic_url FROM UserProfiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM UserPreferences WHERE notification_enabled = true;
SELECT playlist_id, playlist_name, created_by FROM VRPlaylists WHERE is_public = true;
SELECT * FROM UserProfiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM UserProfiles WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT user_id, language FROM UserPreferences WHERE notification_enabled = 'true';
SELECT * FROM ARExperiences WHERE category = 'Education' ORDER BY experience_name ASC;
SELECT playlist_name, created_by FROM VRPlaylists WHERE is_public = 'true' ORDER BY playlist_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM UserProfiles;
SELECT first_name, email FROM UserProfiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, theme, font_size FROM UserPreferences WHERE language = 'English';
SELECT description, image_url FROM ARExperiences WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_data FROM UserInteractions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM UserProfiles ORDER BY age DESC, first_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM UserProfiles WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY last_name, first_name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT u.first_name, u.last_name, e.name AS experience_name FROM UserProfiles u JOIN ARExperiences e ON u.user_id = e.user_id WHERE u.age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 ORDER BY u.first_name, e.name DESC LIMIT 3;

SELECT u.first_name, u.last_name, p.theme, p.language FROM UserProfiles u JOIN UserPreferences p ON u.user_id = p.user_id WHERE p.theme = 'Dark' AND p.language = 'English' ORDER BY u.last_name ASC LIMIT 8;
SELECT i.interaction_type, i.interaction_data->>'action' AS action FROM UserInteractions i WHERE i.timestamp > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY i.timestamp DESC LIMIT 6;
